Service Details: - Presents an annual urban adventure style race for adults where teams of four adults, 18years or older, try to solve clues to find checkpoints hidden around Kelowna, and complete a challenge at each check point- Proceeds raised go to support the programs and services provided by Okanagan Boys and Girls Clubs
Address & Map: Administration Office1434 Graham StKelowna, BC     V1Y 3A8
Former Name: Central Okanagan Boys and Girls Club
